sensors.widgets

Class SonarStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • sensors.widgets.SonarStore

  • public class SonarStore
extends java.lang.Object
    SonarStore is a simple class to hold the results of an Utrasonic Ping Sensor. It contains a Distance, an Angle, and an alpha value for visual effect.

        public void setAlphaDecrement(float newDec)

        Parameters:
        newDec - The amount to subtract from the alpha valu on each iteration
